Before ST. TROPICA launched onto the hair care scene, we dreamed of creating a company that represented our most valued ethics. We love animals and we love our planet. That's why we knew that all of our products would be cruelty-free, vegan, and also made with the planet in mind.

Creating hair care products that are Cruelty-Free, Vegan, Sustainable, and made with Natural Ingredients & Certified Natural Fragrance has been at the core of our brand identity.

We strive to put forth products that you can feel good about using -- knowing that they are good for you, your hair, and the planet, and that they will never be tested on any furry friends.

Yes. We are happy to share that our products are 100% Cruelty-Free and Leaping Bunny Certified. We have never, nor will ever, engage in animal testing or any other harmful practices. This means that we also do not sell our products in countries/locations where animal-testing is mandatory to enter the market.

We are also thrilled to share that we have worked with animal-loving organizations such as Peta to highlight the importance of using Cruelty-Free products. Also, we have supported incredible Animal Charities and Sanctuaries, such as Edgar's Mission, through donations and awareness. If you are an Animal Sanctuary or Charity that would like to connect with our team, please contact us.

The Certified Cruelty-Free Label is provided by the Leaping Bunny Program. In operation since 1996, the Leaping Bunny Program reviews and establishes which companies are truly Cruelty-free and Animal-Friendly so that consumers can feel confident that they are purchasing Cruelty-Free products when shopping.

In the 90's the label "Cruelty-Free" became a popular marketing term for multiple industries. At the time, it was unregulated and companies were able to use the label to mislead consumers. This deceitful practice was put to a halt in 1996 when the Leaping Bunny Program was created by eight national animal protection groups.

Now when you see the Leaping Bunny Logo, you can feel assured that the products you're investing in are Cruelty-Free and trustworthy.

Being Cruelty-Free doesn't mean you need to sacrifice on product quality - in fact, it often means the opposite. At ST. TROPICA, we've ensured that our Hair Care Products are made with only the top natural clean beauty ingredients as well as scientifically proven ingredients. Our meticulously reviewed and sourced ingredients have been specially chosen so that you only get the very best results. Shop ST. TROPICA Hair Care today
